dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: Apple Downgraded by Oppenheimer on Slower iPhone Sales, China Market Pressures
News Content: Apple (AAPL, Financials) was downgraded to Perform from Outperform by Oppenheimer ahead of its first-quarter fiscal 2025 earnings report, with analysts citing slowing iPhone sales and competitive pressures in China.

Pointing to a reduced iPhone sales forecast over the next 12 to 18 months, the investment group also eliminated its $250 price estimate on the shares. Two main issues raised by Oppenheimer analysts Martin Young and Andrew Northcutt were growing competition in China and a dearth of convincing Apple Intelligence and generative artificial intelligence apps to propel near term device upgrades.

Referring to Canalys statistics, the company observed that Apple exports to China dropped 25% in the fourth quarter and dropped 17% in the fourth quarter. Young noted that a delayed iPhone replacement cycle into fiscal 2026 might arise from Apple Intelligence's sluggish adoption and the lack of major generative AI consumer apps.

From prior predictions of $431 billion and $7.73, Oppenheimer reduced its fiscal 2025 sales and earnings per share estimates to $407 billion and $7.22, respectively.

After the market closes on Thursday, Apple is scheduled to unveil its first-quarter fiscal 2025 earnings.

This article first appeared on GuruFocus.

View Comments

Next I will provide you some predictions of stock price movement probabilities by others in the previous rounds.
Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.
Previous predictions:
Round: 0
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.55, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.45
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.6
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.35, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.65
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.45, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.55
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: -1, Prediction of stock price falling: -1
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.3, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.7
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: -1, Prediction of stock price falling: -1


Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

```
{
  "reasoning": "The news article reports that Apple Inc. (AAPL) has been downgraded by Oppenheimer due to slower iPhone sales and competitive pressures in China. The analysts have reduced their sales and earnings per share estimates for fiscal 2025, citing a delayed iPhone replacement cycle and lack of convincing Apple Intelligence and generative artificial intelligence apps. This negative news is likely to have a downward impact on the stock price. However, considering the previous predictions from other models, which show a trend of decreasing probability of stock price rise and increasing probability of stock price fall, it seems that the market has already factored in some negative information about the stock. Therefore, the probability of stock price fall might not be as high as it would be if this news were entirely unexpected. Taking into account the negative news and the trend of previous predictions, I estimate the probability of stock price rise to be lower than 0.5 and the probability of stock price fall to be higher than 0.5.",
  "company_name": "Apple Inc.",
  "company_symbol": "AAPL",
  "news_headline": "Apple Downgraded by Oppenheimer on Slower iPhone Sales, China Market Pressures",
  "probability_of_stock_price_rise": 0.3,
  "probability_of_stock_price_fall": 0.7
}
```
